root.name: getJSONArray()

example.code:
JSONArray json def setup(): json = JSONArray() for i in range(3): JSONArray values = JSONArray() values.setInt(0, i) values.setInt(1, i) values.setInt(2, i) json.setJSONArray(i, values)
println(json) # Sketch prints: #[ # [ # 0, # 0, # 0 # ], # [ # 1, # 1, # 1 # ], # [ # 2, # 2, # 2 # ] #]

root.description: Sets the value of the JSONArray with the associated index value.
